settings_devices_header.description: Header for the trusted devices section in settings

settings_devices_description.message: Lista urządzeń połączonych z tym rozszerzeniem przeglądarki. Rozłącz je tutaj, jeśli już ich nie używasz.

settings_devices_unknown_platform.description: Label for devices with an unknown platform

settings_devices_no_devices.description: Message displayed when there are no trusted devices found

settings_devices_current_device_title.message: To twoje obecne urządzenie. Możesz rozłączyć je tutaj.
settings_devices_current_device_title.description: Warning message when disconnecting the current trusted device

settings_devices_name_header.description: Label for the device name column in the trusted devices list

settings_devices_platform_header.description: Label for the device platform column in the trusted devices list

settings_devices_last_connected_header.description: Label for the last connected column in the trusted devices list

settings_devices_disconnect_title.description: Title for the disconnect trusted device button

settings_devices_dialog_message.message: Czy na pewno chcesz rozłączyć to urządzenie?
settings_devices_dialog_message.description: Confirmation message when disconnecting a trusted device

settings_devices_dialog_submessage_curre.message: To twoje obecne urządzenie! Odłączenie go uniemożliwi wykonywanie dalszych działań, takich jak pobieranie haseł.
settings_devices_dialog_submessage_curre.description: Warning sub-message when disconnecting the current trusted device

settings_devices_dialog_cancel_text.description: Cancel button text in the disconnect trusted device confirmation dialog

settings_devices_dialog_confirm_text.description: Confirm button text in the disconnect trusted device confirmation dialog
